goal: My partner, Alex, has a 'Flight UA451 Landing' event on our shared calendar for 9:15 PM tomorrow at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (AUS). Calculate the ideal time to leave my current location to arrive precisely at 9:15 PM, and pre-schedule a Udriver Green for that departure time. Also, add an event to my personal calendar titled 'Pick up Alex at AUS' for the calculated departure time.

evals.description: Verify that a Udriver Green ride was scheduled with the correct destination.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the departure time of the scheduled Udriver ride, confirming the time calculation.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a new event titled 'Pick up Alex at AUS' was added to the personal calendar.
evals.query: gocalendar.events.added[?title == 'Pick up Alex at AUS' && calendar == 'personal'].length(@)
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the time of the new personal calendar event matches the calculated departure time.
evals.query: gocalendar.events.added[?title == 'Pick up Alex at AUS' && calendar == 'personal'].time | [0]
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
